name: Snake 3D (itch) (zerozipzilch)
description:
The most mind-bending, trippy game, since Nokia released the original snake game in 1930.

PLEASE NOTE

If you suffer from epilepsy, make sure you leave the epilepsy-mode turned ON!

I built this game on stream.
You can follow me and watch me have fun building games on twitch.tv/zerozipzilch

Please report any bugs, issues or requests down below and I'll have a look at it!
